high_impact_events.headline: Nvidia RTX 3090 vs 2080 Ti: which 4K graphics card is better? - Rock Paper Shotgun
high_impact_events.summary: A comparison review between the Nvidia RTX 3090 and 2080 Ti to determine which one offers superior performance for 4K gaming.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event provides valuable information for consumers looking at upgrading their current graphics cards, as well as those considering a new purchase. It helps in making an informed decision.

high_impact_events.headline: Nvidia RTX 3090 Founders Edition: It works hard, it plays hard - PCWorld
high_impact_events.summary: A detailed report on the Nvidia RTX 3090 Founders Edition highlighting its performance capabilities for high-end gaming.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event showcases the latest in GPU technology from Nvidia, which is crucial for gamers and professionals looking to achieve higher frame rates and better visual quality.

high_impact_events.headline: Nvidia RTX 3090 Founders Edition Review Leaked: 10% Faster Than RTX 3080 - Wccftech
high_impact_events.summary: A leaked review indicating that the Nvidia RTX 3090 Founders Edition is approximately 10% faster than its predecessor, the RTX 3080.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event reveals new performance benchmarks for a key product in Nvidia's lineup. It provides insights into future technology advancements and potential upgrades for gamers.

medium_impact_events.headline: Nvidia announces release date for the GeForce RTX 3070 - bit-tech.net
medium_impact_events.summary: The official announcement of the release date for Nvidia's latest RTX 3070 graphics card, setting expectations and plans for gamers.
medium_impact_events.rationale: While not as groundbreaking as new flagship models like the RTX 3090 or 2080 Ti, this event still has significant implications for consumers planning to upgrade their gaming setups.
